TopicTitle: How to get Kerbals back into the roster?

Articles.Content:
So my mission to Jool is finished!

I actually have all 16 Kerbals sitting in a ground shuttle in front of the astronaut complex.

And what now? Just end the flight from the tracking station?

Seems somewhat anticlimactic...

Edited July 26, 2013 by Tokay Gris

Ah! Ok.... it was THAT simple...

There is a "recover vessel" button now in the tracking station. Who would have thought it is that simple....
